meta.title: The Automated Gift Engine: Never Miss a Milestone Again
meta.description: Transform gift-giving from a stressful last-minute chore into a seamless relationship-building system. Learn how to delegate research, procurement, and tracking to your EA.

hero.headline: Delegate Your Gift-Giving and Never Miss a Milestone Again
hero.subheadline: Build a world-class reputation for thoughtfulness while spending less than 30 seconds on every gift.
hero.value_prop: Move from reactive, generic gift-giving to a proactive system where your EA researches, curates, and executes every gift for your personal and professional network.

before.title: The Scramble
pain_points: Realizing it's a VIP's birthday at 4 PM on the day-of
Sending generic Amazon gift cards or 'sorry I missed it' texts
Spending hours scrolling through gift guides every December
Losing track of who received what, leading to embarrassing repeats

after.title: The Thoughtful Executive
benefits: Every milestone is met with a personalized, high-quality gift
Decision time reduced to 30 seconds per recipient
Reputation as the most thoughtful person in your network
Complete peace of mind knowing the system is running in the background

items.label: Recipient Profiles
items.value: Name, relationship type (VIP, Personal, Corporate), and shipping address.

items.label: Milestones
items.value: Birthdays, anniversaries, and company founding dates.

items.label: Preferences
items.value: Dietary restrictions, favorite colors, hobbies, and 'never send' items.

items.label: Budget Tiers
items.value: Pre-defined spending limits (e.g., Tier 1: $500+, Tier 2: $150, Tier 3: $50).

items.label: Gift History
items.value: Log of every gift sent to avoid repeats and track evolving tastes.

sections.title: Setting Up the Proactive Reminder System

items.label: Centralize all dates in a shared calendar
items.details: EA audits your LinkedIn, Facebook, and contact list to populate the database.
substeps: Identify top 50 personal and professional contacts
Add 'Gift Prep' calendar events 14 days before every milestone

items.label: Define your default 'Gift Vibe'
items.details: Tell your EA if you prefer high-end tech, artisanal foods, or experiential gifts.

items.label: Establish payment protocols
items.details: Provide a dedicated card or budget for the EA to use for all gift procurements.

callout.content: Have your EA set a recurring 'Relationship Review' every quarter to add new contacts and remove those no longer in your inner circle.

items.label: T-14 Days: The Curation Ping
items.details: Your EA sends a message: 'Jane Doe's birthday is in 2 weeks. Here are 3 options based on her love of gardening: 1) High-end copper tool set ($120), 2) Rare indoor citrus tree ($85), 3) Subscription to Garden Design Mag ($45). Reply with 1, 2, or 3.'

items.label: T-13 Days: The Selection
items.details: You reply with a single number. If you want a specific note, you dictate it via voice memo; otherwise, the EA drafts a standard thoughtful note for your approval.

items.label: T-12 Days: Procurement
items.details: EA handles the order, ensures gift wrapping is selected, and confirms the delivery date aligns with the milestone.

items.label: T-0 Days: Confirmation
items.details: EA sends you a final notification: 'The gift was delivered to Jane today.' This allows you to follow up with a text or call, appearing incredibly organized.

callout.content: EA: 'Your investor's 10th anniversary is next week. Option 1: Vintage 2014 Champagne. Option 2: Custom leather notebook. Option 3: Donation to their favorite charity.' You: '1. Tell them I'm toastin to another decade!'

items.label: Rush Orders
items.value: EA maintains a 'Last Minute' list of local vendors with same-day delivery (florists, high-end bakeries).

items.label: International
items.value: EA sources vendors within the recipient's country to avoid customs delays and exorbitant shipping fees.

items.label: Corporate Limits
items.value: EA tracks gift value limits for specific companies (e.g., Google or government employees) to ensure compliance.

items.label: Returns/Exchanges
items.value: EA handles all logistics if a gift arrives damaged or needs to be exchanged.

faq.question: How do I ensure the gifts don't feel 'automated' or cold?
faq.answer: The automation is in the *logistics*, not the *intent*. Your EA provides curated options based on your specific knowledge of the person. You still make the final choice and can customize the note in seconds.

faq.question: What if my EA picks something I don't like?
faq.answer: The first 3-5 gifts act as a calibration period. Give feedback like 'Too generic' or 'I love this brand.' Within a month, your EA will understand your taste perfectly.

faq.question: Is it safe to give my EA my credit card for gifts?
faq.answer: We recommend using a dedicated virtual card (like Ramp or Brex) with a set monthly limit specifically for gifting to maintain security and budget control.
